page.title: 04LAW AND ORDER
page.content: There is a police station in Prince's Crescent. There is only one policeman living here now although there used to be two until 5 years ago. We have had no serious crimes for many years but some houses have been burgaled recently. There are often traffic accidents at Staunton Cross but no-one has ever been killed there. Our policeman has to work at Newent, 7 miles away, sometimes and he has a motorbike to help him get there and to Gloucester and to all the villages in our area. He says he would like a panda car!
